m_szDocTitle: Patent US20120107728 - Non-aqueous electrolyte and lithium air battery including the same - Google Patents
m_szDocSumamry: Non-aqueous electrolyte and lithium air battery including the same US 20120107728 A1 Abstract A non-aqueous electrolyte and a lithium air battery including the same. The non-aqueous electrolyte may include an oxygen anion capturing compound to effectively dissociate the reduction reaction product of oxygen formed during discharging of the lithium air battery, reduce the overvoltage of the oxygen evolution reaction occurring during battery charging, and enhance the energy efficiency and capacity of the battery. Images(7) 1. A non-aqueous electrolyte comprising an oxygen anion capturing compound
